Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: With GenAI I could ask same question in multiple ways. I also got more in-depth answers from Gen AI.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not particularly. However, discussion with my teacher ensured that I was heading in the right direction as eventually they would be assessing my work.
